HERO.DESCRIPTION: AcneXpert is the only telemedicine service that can treat you with Accutane, the world’s single most effective acne cure.

WHY_ACCUTANE.TITLE: Why Accutane?
WHY_ACCUTANE.DESCRIPTION: Accutane is the only acne medication that can permanently alter the natural course of acne.

CTA.TITLE:
Introduce your acne to the 
 life-altering potential of Accutane.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How AcneXperts works
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION: Our five step treatment plan only takes five months to show life changing results.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_1_DESCRIPTION: Getting your AcneXpert account up and ready for action only takes five minutes.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_2_DESCRIPTION: We’ll need a few clinical details in order to customize your treatment plan.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_3_DESCRIPTION: One of our U.S. board certified physicians will call you and walk you through everything you need to know about your treatment.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_4_DESCRIPTION: Once you’ve picked up your prescription from the pharmacy, you’re good to go.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_5_DESCRIPTION: To track your progress, we'll need you to send monthly pictures of your acne and a follow up form.
HOW_IT_WORKS.BOX_6_DESCRIPTION: It’s just $59 for the first consultation.

BEFORE_AFTER.TITLE: Drastic, Visible Results
BEFORE_AFTER.DESCRIPTION: What’s really special about Accutane is that the results are so dramatic — not to mention easy to see.

PRICING.TITLE:
Being online means 
 no more in-person appointments
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Forget back-and-forth phone calls, long periods in the waiting room, and trying to find parking. You’ll be treated right at home. We’ll even deliver your prescription to your favorite pharmacy.
PRICING.INSURANCE_COVERED: Usually covered by insurance. Meaning you’ll only pay a small copay at the pharmacy.

ADVANTAGES.TITLE: Simplify your treatment
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_1: Reap the life-changing benefits of Accutane therapy from the comfort of your own home.
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_2: Our specialist board certified licensed U.S.physicians have years of experience working with Accutane.
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_3: You’ll be able to meet with your physician remotely, so there’s no need for regular in-person visits.
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_4: Clear up your acne from the comfort & privacy of your own home.
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_5: Your prescription will be sent to your local pharmacy where you can easily and quickly pick it up.
ADVANTAGES.ADVANTAGE_TEXT_6: Clear up your acne without breaking the bank. You don’t even need to leave your neighborhood.

ABOUT.TITLE: About AcneXpert
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: It’s nice to meet you. Let us introduce ourselves.

STORY.TITLE: It all started…
STORY.DESCRIPTION:
AcneXpert was founded by board certified US physicians with extensive experience treating patients with Accutane (isotretinoin). 

 It’s the first online medicine service that gives patients across the country access to treatment with Accutane, which is the single most effective therapy for acne there is. 

 By cutting out landlord fees and creating a straightforward treatment pipeline, AcneXpert can offer a more affordable medical service —all from the comfort of the patient’s own home and favorite local pharmacy.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION:
Getting acne-free is a life-changing experience. 

 More than 30% of America’s teenagers have low self-esteem due to acne. Accutane clears 85% of patients of ALL acne by Week 16, and produces long-term remission. 

 Seeing a doctor in person once a month left the treatment out of reach for so many busy teens, young adults, and parents. 

 We believe that people everywhere should be able to take full advantage of Accutane’s benefits in a safe and convenient way. We’re committed to helping our patients banish their acne for good, and to providing remote care of the very highest standard.

ACCUTANE.TITLE: Accutane
ACCUTANE.DESCRIPTION: The single most effective therapy for acne there is.

STORY.TITLE: What Is Accutane?
STORY.DESCRIPTION:
Accutane has been approved by the FDA since 1982 for acne treatment, and is still theonly therapy that impacts all of the causes of acne. 

 In addition to as lowering sebum (oil) production by 90% within six weeks, Accutane (which also has anti-inflammatory properties) produces long-term remission. By Week 16 of the therapy, 85% of patients are cleared of acne. There are around one million Accutane prescriptions processed in the US every year.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing
PRICING.DESCRIPTION:
You’ll be paying for the medical services you receive, not for our landlords. You’d need to see a doctor once a month anyway 
 — why not cut out all the traffic and waiting around?

STORY.TITLE: Get treated at home and wave goodbye to stress.
STORY.DESCRIPTION:
The amount you’ll see your doctor won’t change, but the amount of time you spend somewhere you’re comfortable will increase significantly. AcneXpert isn’t just more convenient, it’s more affordable too. 

 If for any reason you don’t want to continue being treated by us, we’ll refund the entire cost of your first consultation. 
 No questions asked.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This form is the first step on your path to freedom from acne. It should take around five minutes to complete. The privacy of your data is of the highest priority to us, and we can guarantee it’ll be handled accordingly, in accordance with HIPAA as well as other privacy standards.
